snapplot: functions for graphing SNAP data sets.

snapplot a suite of functions for graphing and styling plots of publicly available climate science data sets from Scenarios Network for Alaska and Arctic Planning at the University of Alaska Fairbanks. snapplot is a memeber of the SNAPverse collection of R package and primarily serves as a supporting package to other SNAPverse packages, namely snapstat. It is recommended to use snapstat directly when working with SNAP data for graphing and analysis.

Contents

Developed by Matthew Leonawicz, Scenarios Network for Alaska and Arctic Planning.
